title: In case plot area under conversion is less than 2000 sq
clause_text: In case plot area under conversion is less than 2000 sq. m, land component either 10% amenity in the form of open land or 5% of built up amenity shall be considered for the purpose of calculation of amenity as per note (a) and (b) above.
section: Conversion of Industrial Zone to Residential or Commercial Zone for the Uses permissible in Residential or Commercial Zone
